title: COVID-19 and respiratory infections
abstract: COVID-19 is a respiratory disease caused by SARS-CoV-2 virus. The disease primarily affects the lungs and can cause severe pneumonia in some patients. Early symptoms include fever, cough, and difficulty breathing.

title: Machine learning in medical diagnosis # #
abstract: Machine learning algorithms have shown great promise in medical diagnosis. Deep learning models can analyze medical images and patient data to assist doctors in making accurate diagnoses.

title: Information retrieval systems
abstract: Information retrieval systems help users find relevant documents from large collections. Boolean queries and ranking algorithms are fundamental components of search engines.

title: Coronavirus pandemic response
abstract: The coronavirus pandemic has required coordinated global response efforts. Public health measures including social distancing and vaccination have been crucial in controlling the spread.

title: Natural language processing techniques # %
abstract: Natural language processing techniques enable computers to understand and process human language. Text tokenization, indexing, and query processing are important NLP applications.
